review: Dr Surbhi Yadav is an exceptional dentist who performed a root canal treatment with utmost professionalism and care. From the moment I walked into her office, I felt at ease due to her warm demeanor and clear communication about the procedure. Throughout the treatment, she demonstrated a high level of expertise, ensuring minimal discomfort and explaining each step thoroughly. Her attention to detail and precision were evident, leaving me confident in her abilities. Not only did she excel in her technical skills, but she also displayed genuine concern for my well-being, checking in on my comfort regularly. Thanks to Dr Surbhi Yadav my root canal experience was surprisingly pleasant, and I highly recommend her to anyone in need of dental care. She is truly a credit to her profession.

review: My experience was great at the clinic. The doctor was very patient and spent time on the issue, the care and the precautions to take. The treatment was smooth.
